title: who owned the land that sunny point in Southport is on?  Is that the two land markers to the right of the entrance of sunny point that say Walden on them?  They look like the kind of brick columns that were placed at the entrance to an estate.
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/2013/08/what-is-the-story-behind-those-brick-columns-on-n-c-133-near-sunny-point/
